inclusion.criterion: not been suffering from serious chronic illness
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: STH positive for child stool test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no antehelminthic drug in previous six months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: age of the child less than 2 years old and more than 5 years old
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: stool test negative for any intestinal helminth
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease, works at a rehab center and has no allergies to food or drugs.
